title: Rick Radcliffe (Shop teacher)
description: This week we're joined by our friend Rick Radcliffe a man with much patience (auto-shop teacher). Rick arrived in his newly purchased C5 ZO6 and we meander through various subject matter as usual. However Rick didn't swing by just to bullshit, he wanted us to help grade his student's Top Gear Challenge assignments.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
